title: Moon Lord Legs
summaries: The Moon Lord Legs are an armor item for the pants slot. They have a 1/15 (6.67%) chance to be found in Chests in drunk worlds.

The Moon Lord Legs replace the player's legs with <linked>Moon Lord</linked>-themed tentacles which produce a unique walking animation, a purely visual effect. In addition to providing 3 <linked>defense</linked>, the item has the following effects:

• Increases the maximum safe falling distance by 10 tiles, jump speed by 1.8, and jump duration by 1
  • Increases movement speed by 25%

statistics.Tooltip:
Slightly increases mobility
'These might be Steve's'
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
